Articles.Content:
No I don't use CLS, just the vanilla thingy

If the nose of your ship looks like this there should be right![1465840373-screenshot-2016-06-05-12-56-3](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/24/1465840373-screenshot-2016-06-05-12-56-35.png)

Well I guess maybe my docking module was attached to the underside of the node or something. I jimmied the DM a bit and it seems to be working fine now.  Not entirely sure what was up. But the upshot is, the docking is all good now. Apologies for casting aspersions on the fine capsule! Now.. just have to wait for the 7 seat upgrade version..

> 
> 
> 9 hours ago, Chippy the Space Dog said:
> 
> 
> Well I guess maybe my docking module was attached to the underside of the node or something. I jimmied the DM a bit and it seems to be working fine now.  Not entirely sure what was up. But the upshot is, the docking is all good now. Apologies for casting aspersions on the fine capsule! Now.. just have to wait for the 7 seat upgrade version..
> 

Awesome, glad it's working! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

I've been sitting on most of this for a while. I figured I'd get these tweaks out now, since I don't have any immediate other changes coming yet.

**0.3.6 (2016-07-12) - Tweaks.**  

 - Added an optional experimental config for RealChute integration (for the radial chute only).  

    - To enable, rename "GameData/LETech/Patches/LETech\_RealChute.txt" to have "cfg" instead of "txt".  

 - Removed references to "drogue" in the parachute tags.  

 - Added parachute deployment sound effects, as per KSP 1.1.3.

Updated:

**0.4 (2016-10-12) - KSP 1.2 Update.**  

 - Updated categories for many parts.  

 - Added KSP 1.2 sound effects and additional variables for landing legs.  

 - Added transmitter modules to command pods.
Looks like the forum kraken got to this mods album too ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

> 
> 
> 9 hours ago, Bloojay said:
> 
> 
> Looks like the forum kraken got to this mods album too ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")
> 

Yeah, once edited, the album goes away. I don't think we have a work-around right now. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

Hey man your rover garages are too amazing! Sadly, I can't use them. They would be literally the perfect delivery method for my malamute rovers and KPBS base parts but they are just a bit too small. Any chance you could make a 3.5 m rover garage? Maybe also a 5 m one? Just a suggestion, but if you had a 3.5 m one I would be in heaven.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-14T21:35:09Z" title="10/14/2016 09:35  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 14, 2016</time> by Victorsaurus**
  
wat

> 
> 
> On 10/14/2016 at 5:34 PM, Victorsaurus said:
> 
> 
> Hey man your rover garages are too amazing! Sadly, I can't use them. They would be literally the perfect delivery method for my malamute rovers and KPBS base parts but they are just a bit too small. Any chance you could make a 3.5 m rover garage? Maybe also a 5 m one? Just a suggestion, but if you had a 3.5 m one I would be in heaven.
> 

Yep, I probably will. I might add one that's just a rescale of one of the existing ones, and see how that goes.
Whaaat....rover garages? O,o pics? Couldnt see any, which mod? Ive got L.E.Tech

> 
> 
> Just now, Tr1gg3r said:
> 
> 
> Whaaat....rover garages? O,o pics? Couldnt see any, which mod? Ive got L.E.Tech
> 

They're the lander cargo-bays with a "garage" interior, like this:

![iVQL343.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iVQL343.jpg)

Aww m8, thats awesome! Right, im on it. Lol 

deffo gona keep eye out for bigger versions aswell, whenever u get round to it.

time to summon the Ui flicker with some more parts ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

> 
> 
> On 10/28/2016 at 6:54 PM, Deimos Rast said:
> 
> 
> howdy stranger -
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I was futzing around with the latest LETech, when I spied my old RealChute patch hiding as a txt amongst the files. Informative, but doesn't do anyone much good (it also only covered one of the three chutes).
> 
> 
> 
> 
> So I made another patch, which I tested successfully.
> 

Dude! Awesome. I completely forgot about this. I added it in "txt" with the intention of going back and messing with it and adding the other chutes. I have your new config in place, so I can probably push out an update soon and let people start playing with it.
Can you please add some folding ramps for the garages?

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Delta\_8930 said:
> 
> 
> Can you please add some folding ramps for the garages?
> 

It's on my list. I definitely want those. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 19 hours ago, NecroBones said:
> 
> 
> It's on my list. I definitely want those. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

Lol one of my rovers exploded when I drove it out of the garage because I forgot to put a ramp for it to drive down ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
Probably gonna get this for the 4 man capsule. I look forward to a custom IVA as well.
Fun bug: I've just illuminated the surface of the Mun with landing legs lights from 150km orbit.

Because NecroBones might like action shots of his mod, and because I'm proud of this little guy:

Just landed, still in transport configuration:

![screenshot_2016-11-06--01-37-51.png](http://magehandbook.com/KSP/screenshot_2016-11-06--01-37-51.png)

Autonomic science rover deployed, and ready for final field test before setting out.  (And before the Mun exploration crew does their local set of experiments and heads back to Kerbin):

![screenshot_2016-11-06--01-45-08.png](http://magehandbook.com/KSP/screenshot_2016-11-06--01-45-08.png)

The rover is a mix of Buffalo, BDB, Coatl Areospace, and DMagic Science parts.  Mostly.
Doh! Historian working on 1.2? ![:blink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_blink.png ":blink:")

Ok, I can go back in my room and cry a lot again ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif ";.;") 

Where are the engines for this lander? I can't find how it landed safely without engines ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")

Heh.  It uses the skycrane from <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr> - the engine is directly above the decoupler.  It's retracted at the moment, as in this ship the engines and the ladders can't be deployed at the same time. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
